data.title: Tangla College – Model Degree College by the Govt. India under Rashtriya Uchchatar Siksha Abhiyan
data.text:
Welcome To

Tangla College

Welcome To

Tangla College

Subject Selection of 1st semester NEP FYUGP STUDENTS 2024-25

About College

Tangla College (Tangla Mahavidyalay in Assamese) came into existence in the year 1970 as a result of sincere and untiring efforts of some of the leading personalities of the northern part of the undivided Darrang District of Assam. The college is located in a plot of land of 101 bighas 2 kathas 15 lechas reserved by the Government of Assam in the name of Tangla College. Late Hiralal Patowary, the then MLA of Panery Legislative Assembly Constituency, was the first secretary of the sponsoring Body and late J. Duara, the then Sub-Divisional Officer (Civil) of Mangaldai Sub-Division, was the President of the Body. The College was set up with the noble objective of catering the needs of higher education to the socially and economically backward people of the region. Initially, the college started to impart Arts education at Pre-University level. The Degree Courses in Arts was introduced in 1972.

To The Journey Ahead

Gain Valuable Knowledge & Experience

College Motto

The motto of the college is “Let the light of knowledge spread over all corners”.

UGC Grants

Tangla College has been enjoying grants from UGC under 2(F) & 12(B) scheme since its recognition under the 8th Plan.

Our Featured Courses

B.A(Regular/Honours)

B.Sc(Regular/Honours)

Explore scientific realms with our B.Sc (Regular/Honours) programs—igniting curiosity, knowledge, and a path to innovation.

B.Com(Regular/Honours)

Embark on a dynamic business journey with our B.Com (Regular/Honours) programs—shaping commerce leaders for tomorrow’s challenges.

BCA(Regular/Honours)

Ignite your tech passion with our BCA (Regular/Honours) programs—nurturing future IT innovators and leaders.

Certificate Courses

Elevate your skills with our diverse Certificate Courses—tailored for success in today’s dynamic job market.

Our Principal & Lecturer

Principal & Lecturer

Welcome to Tangla College, one of the premier institutions of higher education in the entire Bodoland Territorial Council, Assam (India). The College was set up in 1970 with the noble objective of catering the needs of higher education to the socially and economically backward masses of the region. The establishment of Tangla College was a bold step in spreading and promoting higher education and dissemination of knowledge in the North-Western part of the then Darrang District and now the Udalguri District of Assam. Since its inception, Tangla College has been the nerve-centre for intellectual, academic, sports and cultural pursuits in the region.

Dr. Prasen Daimari, M.A. in Economics (NEHU), Ph. D. (NEHU)

Tangla College, Principal
